problem_names: lemma no_subst[simp]: "k \<notin> atoms F \<Longrightarrow> F[G / k] = F"
lemma subst_atoms: "k \<in> atoms F \<Longrightarrow> atoms (F[G / k]) = atoms F - {k} \<union> atoms G"
lemma subst_atoms_simp: "atoms (F[G / k]) = atoms F - {k} \<union> (if k \<in> atoms F then atoms G else {})"
translations: lemma no_subst[simp]: "k \<notin> atoms F \<Longrightarrow> F[G / k] = F"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. k \<notin> atoms F \<Longrightarrow> F[G/k] = F
by(induction F; simp)
lemma subst_atoms: "k \<in> atoms F \<Longrightarrow> atoms (F[G / k]) = atoms F - {k} \<union> atoms G"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. k \<in> atoms F \<Longrightarrow>
    atoms (F[G/k]) = atoms F - {k} \<union> atoms G
proof(induction F)

proof (state)
goal (6 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x.
       k \<in> atoms (Atom x) \<Longrightarrow>
       atoms (Atom x[G/k]) = atoms (Atom x) - {k} \<union> atoms G
 2. k \<in> atoms \<bottom> \<Longrightarrow>
    atoms (\<bottom>[G/k]) = atoms \<bottom> - {k} \<union> atoms G
 3. \<And>F.
       \<lbrakk>k \<in> atoms F \<Longrightarrow>
                atoms (F[G/k]) = atoms F - {k} \<union> atoms G;
        k \<in> atoms (\<^bold>\<not> F)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> atoms (\<^bold>\<not> F[G/k]) =
                         atoms (\<^bold>\<not> F) - {k} \<union> atoms G
 4. \<And>F1 F2.
       \<lbrakk>k \<in> atoms F1 \<Longrightarrow>
                atoms (F1[G/k]) = atoms F1 - {k} \<union> atoms G;
        k \<in> atoms F2 \<Longrightarrow>
        atoms (F2[G/k]) = atoms F2 - {k} \<union> atoms G;
        k \<in> atoms (F1 \<^bold>\<and> F2)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> atoms ((F1 \<^bold>\<and> F2)[G/k]) =
                         atoms (F1 \<^bold>\<and> F2) - {k} \<union> atoms G
 5. \<And>F1 F2.
       \<lbrakk>k \<in> atoms F1 \<Longrightarrow>
                atoms (F1[G/k]) = atoms F1 - {k} \<union> atoms G;
        k \<in> atoms F2 \<Longrightarrow>
        atoms (F2[G/k]) = atoms F2 - {k} \<union> atoms G;
        k \<in> atoms (F1 \<^bold>\<or> F2)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> atoms ((F1 \<^bold>\<or> F2)[G/k]) =
                         atoms (F1 \<^bold>\<or> F2) - {k} \<union> atoms G
 6. \<And>F1 F2.
       \<lbrakk>k \<in> atoms F1 \<Longrightarrow>
                atoms (F1[G/k]) = atoms F1 - {k} \<union> atoms G;
        k \<in> atoms F2 \<Longrightarrow>
        atoms (F2[G/k]) = atoms F2 - {k} \<union> atoms G;
        k \<in> atoms (F1 \<^bold>\<rightarrow> F2)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> atoms ((F1 \<^bold>\<rightarrow> F2)[G/k]) =
                         atoms (F1 \<^bold>\<rightarrow> F2) - {k} \<union>
                         atoms G
case (And F G)

proof (state)
this:
  k \<in> atoms F \<Longrightarrow>
  atoms (F[G/k]) = atoms F - {k} \<union> atoms G
  k \<in> atoms G \<Longrightarrow>
  atoms (G[G/k]) = atoms G - {k} \<union> atoms G
  k \<in> atoms (F \<^bold>\<and> G)

goal (6 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x.
       k \<in> atoms (Atom x) \<Longrightarrow>
       atoms (Atom x[G/k]) = atoms (Atom x) - {k} \<union> atoms G
 2. k \<in> atoms \<bottom> \<Longrightarrow>
    atoms (\<bottom>[G/k]) = atoms \<bottom> - {k} \<union> atoms G
 3. \<And>F.
       \<lbrakk>k \<in> atoms F \<Longrightarrow>
                atoms (F[G/k]) = atoms F - {k} \<union> atoms G;
        k \<in> atoms (\<^bold>\<not> F)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> atoms (\<^bold>\<not> F[G/k]) =
                         atoms (\<^bold>\<not> F) - {k} \<union> atoms G
 4. \<And>F1 F2.
       \<lbrakk>k \<in> atoms F1 \<Longrightarrow>
                atoms (F1[G/k]) = atoms F1 - {k} \<union> atoms G;
        k \<in> atoms F2 \<Longrightarrow>
        atoms (F2[G/k]) = atoms F2 - {k} \<union> atoms G;
        k \<in> atoms (F1 \<^bold>\<and> F2)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> atoms ((F1 \<^bold>\<and> F2)[G/k]) =
                         atoms (F1 \<^bold>\<and> F2) - {k} \<union> atoms G
 5. \<And>F1 F2.
       \<lbrakk>k \<in> atoms F1 \<Longrightarrow>
                atoms (F1[G/k]) = atoms F1 - {k} \<union> atoms G;
        k \<in> atoms F2 \<Longrightarrow>
        atoms (F2[G/k]) = atoms F2 - {k} \<union> atoms G;
        k \<in> atoms (F1 \<^bold>\<or> F2)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> atoms ((F1 \<^bold>\<or> F2)[G/k]) =
                         atoms (F1 \<^bold>\<or> F2) - {k} \<union> atoms G
 6. \<And>F1 F2.
       \<lbrakk>k \<in> atoms F1 \<Longrightarrow>
                atoms (F1[G/k]) = atoms F1 - {k} \<union> atoms G;
        k \<in> atoms F2 \<Longrightarrow>
        atoms (F2[G/k]) = atoms F2 - {k} \<union> atoms G;
        k \<in> atoms (F1 \<^bold>\<rightarrow> F2)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> atoms ((F1 \<^bold>\<rightarrow> F2)[G/k]) =
                         atoms (F1 \<^bold>\<rightarrow> F2) - {k} \<union>
                         atoms G
thus ?case

proof (prove)
using this:
  k \<in> atoms F \<Longrightarrow>
  atoms (F[G/k]) = atoms F - {k} \<union> atoms G
  k \<in> atoms G \<Longrightarrow>
  atoms (G[G/k]) = atoms G - {k} \<union> atoms G
  k \<in> atoms (F \<^bold>\<and> G)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. atoms ((F \<^bold>\<and> G)[G/k]) =
    atoms (F \<^bold>\<and> G) - {k} \<union> atoms G
by(cases "k \<in> atoms F"; force)

 4. \<And>F1 F2.
       \<lbrakk>k \<in> atoms F1 \<Longrightarrow>

        k \<in> atoms F2 \<Longrightarrow>

        k \<in> atoms (F1 \<^bold>\<or> F2)\<rbrakk>

 5. \<And>F1 F2.
       \<lbrakk>k \<in> atoms F1 \<Longrightarrow>
                atoms (F1[G/k]) = atoms F1 - {k} \<union> atoms G;
        k \<in> atoms F2 \<Longrightarrow>
        atoms (F2[G/k]) = atoms F2 - {k} \<union> atoms G;

using this:

lemma subst_atoms_simp: "atoms (F[G / k]) = atoms F - {k} \<union> (if k \<in> atoms F then atoms G else {})"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. atoms (F[G/k]) =
    atoms F - {k} \<union> (if k \<in> atoms F then atoms G else {})
by(simp add: subst_atoms)
end
